@psykou: That's how magnet links work. You don't see the files (or get the option to skip anything at first) but you press OK and allow the download anyway and wait for around a minute till you can see  the files being downloaded on utorrent. You may then skip anything if you'd like to.

@psykou,
i don't know why the "download torrent file" button disappeared either. not everybody wants to download a torrent right away. they might want to save the files and later choose to download on another machine (and not always all files in one toreent). it is so inconvenient without that option. you can go to publichd.org where you are still able to do so.
